name: 2D Fast Police Car Chase Game - Free Real Speed Driving Racing Games
name_original: 2D Fast Police Car Chase Game - Free Real Speed Driving Racing Games
description:
=======================
*** DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE ***

Become a police officer! The city needs you to get to accidents fast. Quickly zip through traffic without hitting any cars. You get 3 lives before loosing. Get your highest score and compete with other players in Game Center.

As the game progresses, the difficulty also increases. It’s a fun, challenging game that’s sure to entertain you for hours.

Are you ready? Download this game today and play away!

*** Game Features***

• Super Exciting Game
• Realistic Environment
• Easy Controls
• Great Graphics
• Guaranteed Hours of Fun

*** REMINDER ***

Don’t hesitate! Policeman needs to be able to drive fast.
